movies.title: Bumblebee

movies.title: Mary Poppins Returns
movies.descrpition: Decades after her original visit, the magical nanny returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

movies.title: Second Act
movies.descrpition: A big box store worker reinvents her life and her life-story and shows Madison Avenue what street smarts can do.

movies.title: Welcome to Marwen
movies.descrpition: A victim of a brutal attack finds a unique and beautiful therapeutic outlet to help him through his recovery process.

movies.title: Zimna wojna
movies.descrpition: A passionate love story between two people of different backgrounds and temperaments, who are fatefully mismatched and yet condemned to each other. Set against the background of the Cold

movies.title: They Shall Not Grow Old
movies.descrpition: A documentary about World War I with never-before-seen footage to commemorate the centennial of the end of the war.
